# Connectivity

```{julia}
# | code-fold: true
using Ribasim: Parameters, neighbortypes
using DataFrames: DataFrame
using MarkdownTables

node_names = Vector{Symbol}()
for (node_name, node_type) in zip(fieldnames(Parameters), fieldtypes(Parameters))
    if node_type <: Ribasim.AbstractParameterNode
        push!(node_names, node_name)
    end
end

df = DataFrame()
for node_name in node_names
    df[!, node_name] =
        [(node_name in neighbortypes(node_name_)) for node_name_ in node_names]
end

markdown_table(df)
```
